name: SUPER MAZE PLANET
description:
Super Maze Planet is a relaxing Retro maze game that gives you bigger mazes as you progress through the levels. Super Maze Planet has over 900 mazes in 10 zones, with coins to pick up and characters to collect. When you earn enough gold you can unlock infinite procedural mazes so you will always have another maze to amaze yourself with!

Use the Gamepads XBOX One or Xbox 360, keyboard WASD or arrow keys to control your character

- Over 900 levels!
- 10 zones!
- Unlock procedural mazes for unlimited mazes!
- Atmosphere
- A cat AND a unicorn!!!

Checkout the other new Kingsguard Games release:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928850/STAR_MATH_Interstellar_Rogue_2/
